entry.title: Day 1
entry.summary:
title: “Hello world” date: 2025-04-10 20:17:59 — Hello world
This is my personal blog. woohoo!!
Finally. After 2 full years of the ‘want to do things’ cycle, i’ve finally sat down today to setup my blog on github pages where i hope to post everyday about something i learn, in a way to track my progress in things and also exploring the sea of STEM, art(poetry+music), spirituality and some lear...
